DOC.brief_summary: This trial investigate effect FE 200440 compare placebo implantation rate woman undergo IVF/ICSI treatment
DOC.brief_title: Barusiban Subcutaneously Reducing Implantation Failure Due Uterine Contractions
DOC.criteria: Women age 1837 year Women undergone 24 previous fresh vitro fertilization ( IVF ) intracytoplasmatic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle result negative Î²hCG test , despite transfer least one embryo/blastocyst good quality Women current control ovarian stimulation cycle IVF/ICSI follow long Gonadotrophin Releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) agonist GnRH antagonist protocol , receive hCG trigger final follicular maturation undergone oocyte retrieval IVF/ICSI purpose fresh transfer Retrieval least 6 oocyte current control ovarian stimulation cycle Subjects least one embryo good quality available transfer day 3 , least one good quality blastocyst available transfer day 5 A total 6 control ovarian stimulation cycle IVF/ICSI Abnormal karyotype Uterine pathology hydrosalpinx Diagnosed acquire congenital thrombophilia disease
